name: Zipporreal
description:
Max's Math Book has opened up a portal to hostile otherworldy dimensions! Help his creation, Zipman to ride the dimensional zip-lines and seal the cosmic tears.

Zipporreal is a 2D platformer made by:

CANBANJAM

Who are:
Lachlan Pini: Concept, Art & Animation

Andrew Banagala: Programming Lead

Austen Sukro: Additional Programming

Nic "Mungey" Dullow: Sound Design and Music

Hanif Patel: Guitars and Additional Music

Thanks to:
Ryan Hoskin for Idea Development and Melissa Rouen for Photoshop Support

This is our first game jam ever! We're proud of what we were able to get together in the the 48 hrs and learned a lot a along the way. We're hoping to develop this further and try to fix up and achieve some of what we had in our original scope. Thank you to the organizers for GMTK's 2021 game jam for making it all possible!
